name: SkillSync
quickDescription: Advanced performance tracking and analysis tool for optimizing athlete development in academies.
description: Developed a web-based application for Apex2100 to track, analyze, and improve athlete performance. The platform features automated PDF report generation and distribution, comprehensive data visualization tools, and a sophisticated rating system for athletes. SkillSync transforms raw athletic data into actionable insights, enhancing decision-making processes for coaches. This project leverages data-driven approaches to optimize athletic training and performance evaluation, providing valuable tools for sports professionals.

name: Octopus
quickDescription: Enhance the coordination and preparation of A400M air missions, offering a centralized and collaborative platform for streamlined operations.
description: A project for beta.gouv.fr startups and French Air Force. This project provides the French Air Force with a modern online platform, accessible through their secure internal network, to coordinate and prepare A400M air missions. By replacing outdated Excel workflows, the tool centralizes mission data, facilitates real-time collaboration among teams, and streamlines the overall mission preparation process. This results in improved efficiency, faster decision-making, and more effective mission execution.

name: GearTracker
quickDescription: Efficient gear management and tracking system for outdoor enthusiasts and professionals.
description: GearTracker is a comprehensive solution for managing and tracking outdoor equipment. It helps users keep tabs on their gear, plan maintenance schedules, and optimize their equipment usage. Whether you're a weekend warrior or a professional guide, GearTracker streamlines your gear management process, ensuring you're always prepared for your next adventure.
